body: Ight bro imah need a 4 hr YouTube video explaining this bum ass plot to me

This one started in the Poppin' Cherry tankoubon, and the general background was as explained by the other users: Satona was raised well and worked as a proper idol, unaware that she had a twin, Satomi, who was raised and abused in an orphanage and became a pornstar. At some point, Satomi plotted a revenge against Satona by trapping her into starring in AVs under her real name, all the while she moved in with Kousuke as Satona.
Shit happened, Satomi was double-crossed by the orphanage guys, but Kousuke came and saved both girls, and they moved in with him. However, some unspecified time later, Satona returned to porn under the name Haruka because she was addicted to the sex, although she still loved Kousuke.
This one and the prequel explored the consequences of Satona returning to porn, including Kousuke finally snapping because he thought Satona only saw him as a convenient man, and he blamed it all on Satomi, who'd ironically already quit AV after he saved her.

To add on to @sedoboi abd @zombieadd's comment: Satona was not blakmailed by a picture of Satomi but rather a picture of herself. You can see that the girl on the picture only has one beuty mark which suggests that Satona was the one in th photo, not Satomi. Besides that, we can infer that Satona was raped a long time before she vecame a porn star and along time before the events of the doujin. In part 1 pages 20-21 you can see an image of Satona tied up and raped. In those same pages you can hear the bf talking about how he never wants to leavr Satona hinting at the fact that she was taken from him. Furthermore, throughout ch 1, you can see the face of a man fucking Satona. Namely in page 42 you can see the spicific face of the man fucking her. This is important as nearly all the faces of the men fucking Satona (in ch 1) are blurry or not drawn in. In that same page and the page after it Satona is also talking about how she was robbed of her virginity and was trained.
What the fuck? I'm so lost in this shit, i don't even know who is who

@sedoboi (scroll down to see his comment if interested): I think his comment pretty much nailed it right the basic summary of this story. \\\ Aside from that, I'm confused on page 50 top left panel... when Kousuke says "Satona! Your womb...", shouldn't that be "Satomi! Your womb..."??? Cuz that's the girl with the extra beauty mark as indicated in part 1 page 5 to be Satomi? Anyways, based on part 1 when Satona said she "just can't give [Kousuke] what [he] want[s]," as kamitokaryusai says "Both of u are fake asf so shit up", couldn't be said any better than that.

Basic story (I guess) : There's twins. One was born in a loving family and turned into an idol (Satona), while one was born in an orphanage, turned into a plaything, and ended up as a legendary pornstar/high-class escort (Satomi). 

Satona was blackmailed by her co-worker (with a picture of Satomi), and basically her idol life was ruined. At the same time, Satomi moved in with Satona and the MC. Satona is forced to replace Satomi as a pornstar, while MC vents out his frustrations on Satomi. MC says he's probably gonna do something for Satona's sake, but we'll see in the later chapters.

Did I get it right, doujin curators?
The MGS/Kingdom Hearts of Hentai Storytelling.
